verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against Gog <WH1463>, the land <WH776> of Magog <WH4031>, the chief <WH7218> prince <WH5387> of Meshech <WH4902> and Tubal <WH8422>, and prophesy against him <WH5012>,
And say <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Behold <WH1463>, I am against you, O Gog, the chief <WH7218> prince <WH5387> of Meshech <WH4902> and Tubal <WH8422>:

And I will turn you back <WH7725>, and put <WH5414> hooks <WH2397> into your jaws <WH3895>, and I will bring you forth <WH3318>, and all your army <WH2428>, horses <WH5483> and horsemen <WH6571>, all of them clothed <WH3847> with all sorts <WH4358> of armor <WH7227>, even a great company <WH6951> with bucklers <WH6793> and shields <WH4043>, all of them handling <WH8610> swords <WH2719>:
Persia <WH6539>, Ethiopia <WH3568>, and Libya <WH6316> with them <WH4043>; all of them with shield and helmet <WH3553>:
Gomer <WH1586>, and all his bands <WH102>; the house <WH1004> of Togarmah <WH8425> of the north <WH6828> quarters <WH3411>, and all his bands <WH102>: and many <WH7227> people with you <WH5971>.
Be you prepared <WH3559>, and prepare <WH3559> for yourself <WH6951>, you, and all your company that are assembled <WH6950> unto you <WH4929>, and be you a guard unto them.

After many <WH7227> days <WH3117> you shall be visited <WH6485>: in the latter <WH319> years <WH8141> you shall come <WH935> into the land <WH776> that is brought back <WH7725> from the sword <WH2719>, and is gathered <WH6908> out of many <WH7227> people <WH5971>, against the mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478>, which have been always <WH8548> waste <WH2723>: but it is brought forth <WH3318> out of the nations <WH5971>, and they shall live <WH3427> safely all of them <WH983>.

You shall ascend <WH5927> and come <WH935> like a storm <WH7722>, you shall be like a cloud <WH6051> to cover <WH3680> the land <WH776>, you <WH102>, and all your bands, and many <WH7227> people with you <WH5971>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; It shall also come to pass <WH3117>, that at the same time shall things <WH1697> come <WH5927> into your mind <WH3824>, and you shall think <WH2803> a evil <WH7451> thought <WH4284>:

And you shall say <WH559>, I will go up <WH5927> to the land <WH776> of unwalled villages <WH6519>; I will go <WH935> to them that are at rest <WH8252>, that live <WH3427> safely <WH983>, all of them living <WH3427> without walls <WH2346>, and having neither bars <WH1280> nor gates <WH1817>,

To take <WH7997> a plunder <WH7998>, and to take <WH962> a prey <WH957>; to turn <WH7725> your hand <WH3027> upon the desolate places <WH2723> that are now inhabited <WH3427>, and upon the people <WH5971> that are gathered <WH622> out of the nations <WH1471>, which have gotten <WH6213> cattle <WH4735> and goods <WH7075>, that live <WH3427> in the midst <WH2872> of the land <WH776>.

Sheba <WH7614>, and Dedan <WH1719>, and the merchants <WH5503> of Tarshish <WH8659>, with all the young lions <WH3715> there <WH559>, shall say unto you <WH935>, Are you come to take <WH7997> a plunder <WH7998>? have you gathered <WH6950> your company <WH6951> to take <WH962> a prey <WH957>? to carry away <WH5375> silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, to take away <WH3947> cattle <WH4735> and goods <WH7075>, to take <WH7997> a great <WH1419> plunder <WH7998>?

Therefore <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> and say <WH559> unto Gog <WH1463>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; In that day <WH3117> when my people <WH5971> of Israel <WH3478> dwells <WH3427> safely <WH983>, shall you not know it <WH3045>?

And you shall come <WH935> from your place <WH4725> out of the north <WH6828> parts <WH3411>, you <WH7227>, and many people <WH5971> with you <WH7392>, all of them riding upon horses <WH5483>, a great <WH1419> company <WH6951>, and a mighty <WH7227> army <WH2428>:

And you shall come up <WH5927> against my people <WH5971> of Israel <WH3478>, as a cloud <WH6051> to cover <WH3680> the land <WH776>; it shall be in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>, and I will bring <WH935> you against my land <WH776>, that the heathen <WH1471> may know <WH3045> me <WH6942>, when I shall be sanctified in you <WH1463>, O Gog, before their eyes <WH5869>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Are you he of whom I have spoken <WH1696> in old <WH6931> time <WH3117> by <WH3027> my servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030> of Israel <WH3478>, which prophesied <WH5012> in those days <WH3117> many years <WH8141> that I would bring you against them <WH935>?

And it shall come to pass at the same time <WH3117> when <WH3117> Gog <WH1463> shall come <WH935> against the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, that my fury <WH2534> shall come up <WH5927> in my face <WH639>.

For in my jealousy <WH7068> and in the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678> have I spoken <WH1696>, Surely in that day <WH3117> there shall be a great <WH1419> shaking <WH7494> in the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>;

So that the fish <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220>, and the birds <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064>, and the animals <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, and all creeping things <WH7431> that creep <WH7430> upon the earth <WH127>, and all the men <WH120> that are upon the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>, shall shake <WH7493> at my presence <WH6440>, and the mountains <WH2022> shall be thrown down <WH2040>, and the steep places <WH4095> shall fall <WH5307>, and every wall <WH2346> shall fall <WH5307> to the ground <WH776>.

And I will call <WH7121> for a sword <WH2719> against him throughout all my mountains <WH2022>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>: every man <WH376>'s sword <WH2719> shall be against his brother <WH251>.

And I will plead <WH8199> against him with pestilence <WH1698> and with blood <WH1818>; and I will rain <WH4305> upon him <WH102>, and upon his bands, and upon the many <WH7227> people <WH5971> that are with him <WH7857>, a overflowing rain <WH1653>, and great hailstones <WH417>, fire <WH784>, and brimstone <WH1614>.

Thus will I magnify <WH1431> myself <WH6942>, and sanctify myself <WH3045>; and I will be known in the eyes <WH5869> of many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>, and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.
